.. _demo:

#############
Demonstration
#############

This section provides a demonstration of |project| capabilities.

The first subsection shows how to manually write features with the directives
documented in the :ref:`directives` section, while the second is generated
using the :ref:`gherkin2rst` command line tool.

For a quick tutorial, see :ref:`usage`.  For a more formal documentation,
see :ref:`references`.

    :maxdepth: 1

    examplefeature
    generated/features
